alterniumInfo.name: Stormbringer
alterniumInfo.description: Activates and additional Lv. 5 AoE attack when casting Special Skill (Reach and attack range +50%). ASPD +45% instead (Cannot be canceled) and becomes immune to Stun for 8 s.

reviewGeneral.raw: {"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[{"type":"bold"}],"value":"Summary","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"heading-5"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"Awakened Jake is a PVP-oriented bulky utility frontline tank with renewable barriers and anti-mech capabilities. He debuffs nearby enemies, lowering their attack and applying max HP% based burn.","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"Jake’s Alternium Reactor improves his special skill by increasing the ASPD self-buff, adding low uptime stun immunity and allowing Special to hit enemies even further away than before.","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[{"type":"bold"}],"value":"PVE Review","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"heading-5"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"In PVE, Awakened Jake provides the bare minimum of being a frontline that doesn’t die. He sees use in Last Stand as a durable frontline with a consistent attack down debuff and a few mech stages that can be stunned such as Dimensional Trimming Swift Room 1.","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[{"type":"bold"}],"value":"PVP Review","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"heading-5"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"While Jake’s kit is specialised towards being a tech unit against mech, he is one of the strongest frontline winconditions against any team. His ultimate provides a strong displacement effect, mapwide skill seal and buff block which is often enough to push for a win regardless of which faction you face. ","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"Jake’s main weakness comes from his reliance on cancelable barriers for survivability. This makes him very squishy against buff block effects (e.g. Awakened Yuna) and even squishier against Barrier Reflux effect (e.g. Awakened Na Yubin, Awakened Karin Wong).","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"Outside of barrier hate there isn’t much counterplay available to Jake and it all boils down to killing him before his ultimate comes online. He is squishier than other awakened defenders of the same DP cost, making it relatively easier to meet the damage requirement to kill him.","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"}],"nodeType":"document"}

pros.raw: {"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"Anti-mech tech unit that is serviceable against other factions ","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"}],"nodeType":"list-item"}],"nodeType":"unordered-list"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"}],"nodeType":"document"}

description.description: A defender that can neutralize range enemies

introduction.introduction:
테크레벨 5 장비, 스톰 브링거를 착용한 제이크 워커 대령은 자신의 영역 내에 들어선 적을 약화시키는 데 특화된 디펜더입니다.
워커 대령의 CRF 출력은 한마디로 요약해 이례적이라고 할 수 있습니다. 그 위력이 지나친 나머지, 종래에는 출력을 높일 경우 심각한 부상을 입을 우려까지 존재했습니다.
하지만 스톰 브링거를 투입하면서 이러한 우려는 종식되었습니다. 스톰 브링거는 워커 대령의 힘을 축적해 적을 분쇄하는 강력한 전기장 형태로 방출합니다. 더 이상 힘을 억누를 필요가 사라진 워커 대령은 자신을 부르는 곳이면 어디든 갈 준비가 되어 있습니다.

pvp.notes: Jake dies less on real tank gear

baseDescription.baseDescription: Punches forward with lightning-charged gauntlets, inflicting damage on a target in front.

When deployed, he creates a stasis field for 6 seconds that decreases Mech units’ ATK by 30%, and their HP by 3% per second. (Noncancelable, Bosses excluded) After every 3rd Basic attack, he inflicts AoE damage on Mech units and stuns them for 2 seconds, and creates another stasis field.

level5.level5: Stasis field grants a barrier by 15% of Max HP and applies half the effect to units other than Mech.

baseDescription.baseDescription: Combines two skills, inflicting AoE damage and targeting the caster for 6 seconds. When this skill is used, the caster becomes immune to Hitstun from Special or lower skills and his ASPD increases by 30% for 12 seconds.

level5.level5: Cooldown -4 s, additional AoE attack on the farthest target in a 900-reach range (Mech is stunned◇ for 5 s).

baseDescription.baseDescription: Quickly gathers enemies and creates a traveling explosion along the ground to inflict AoE damage. This skill creates a stasis field and prevents enemies from using skills or receiving buffs for 8 seconds. (Bosses excluded)

level5.level5: Adds ASPD -25% to the debuff. Skill cooldown -4 s when an enhanced attack is used.
